event.title: September 1943 the first regional committee of the Liberation Front of the Slovene Nation was headquartered

data.event: During the Second World War, from March to September 1943 the first regional committee of the Liberation Front of the Slovene Nation was headquartered at the house of Ivan Žigante (a.k.a. Peter) in the hamlet of Žgani.

event.title: was burned by German forces on 12 October 1943

data.event: Loka was burned by German forces on 12 October 1943.

event.title: was burned by German forces on 12 October 1943

data.event: The medieval church was burned by German forces on 12 October 1943 and its ruins were registered as cultural heritage.

event.title: was rebuilt by the villagers in 2005

data.event: The church was rebuilt by the villagers in 2005.
